actionCalls.description: This is triggering SendGrid to send an email.
actionCalls.name: COMMON_Qualified_Email_Alert
actionCalls.label: COMMON - Qualified Email Alert

actionCalls.description: This is triggering SendGrid to send an email.
actionCalls.name: COMMON_Waitlist_Availability_Email
actionCalls.label: COMMON - Waitlist Availability Email

decisions.name: Check_Brand_Type_for_Reschedule_Tour
decisions.label: Check Brand Type for Reschedule Tour

decisions.description: This is looking at what the stage status is of the opportunity that invoked this flow. It then decides what email to send based on the opportunities stage status (or other criteria set below in this node).
decisions.name: Stage_Status
decisions.label: Stage Status

Flow.description: This sends our unresponsive touch one emails (invoked by a process builder). The reason we moved this to a flow is because of our NOAH and KIN brands which should get different emails. This flow checks what brand it is and then sends the correct email.

formulas.name: DynamicFormName
formulas.expression: IF ( TEXT({!Opportunity.Brand__c}) == "noah", "Noah Leasing ", IF( TEXT({!Opportunity.Brand__c}) == "kin", {!Owner.FirstName} +" from Mily", "Common Admissions" ) )

formulas.description: removes the line breaks in the formula
formulas.name: SelfScheduledTourLinkPrefixFormula

Flow.label: CIS - Automated emails based on stage/status with brand

recordCreates.name: Closed_Lost_All_Brands_Emails_PE
recordCreates.label: Closed Lost All Brands Emails - PE

recordLookups.description: This is getting the account from the opportunity "Account" field in the previous GET opportunity node.
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Get Account

recordLookups.name: Get_Cancelled_Tour_Scheduled_with_in_Last_7_Days
recordLookups.label: Get Cancelled Tour Scheduled with in Last 7 Days

recordLookups.description: The opportunity is passed into this flow from the process builder that invokes it.
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunities
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunities

recordLookups.description: This is getting the owner of the opportunity that started this flow.
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity_Owner
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity Owner
